name: Hot Rods: Highway to Rod
description:
Do you like all thrills of a demolition derby, but hate high priced rodeo tickets?!?

Well today is your chance to huck cars into the abyss… and for a good cause.

Your bro Little Rod has been kidnapped and forced into an awkward brolationship with Satan!

Time to free your bro, the only way you know how…. VEHICULAR DESTRUCTION!

Launch vehicles into the ground until you reach hell (AKA Satan’s Brocave).

Each block destroyed improves your explosive capabilities, but beware, the path to hell is paved with some real tough boi blocks.

---

KEYBOARD CONTROLS

WASD - Aim Launcher

Q and E - to lower or raise the depth of the launcher

SPACEBAR - Launch Cars

GAMEPAD/CONTROLLER CONTROLS

LEFT STICK - Aim Launcher

Left Trigger or Right Trigger - to lower or raise the depth of the launcher

A or Right Bumper - Launch Cars
